long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
reChrome 
is a multi purpose explorative and organiser tool 

-explore top 50 sites randomly from around the web with their categories 
-create tab groups for all the tabs open  in your current working window and organise them by their domain name or from the same website


features to add :
soon will be integrating ai to help you organise your tabs more and train it on your own tab data 
open tabs for your entertainment from a vast category 
will add more categories including spicy ones 

all of that features to be added are going to be soon in your hands
